summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a victim, identified as [REDACTED], conducted on October 16, 2019. She describes being recruited as a minor in approximately 2004 to give Jeffrey Epstein a sexualized massage at his Palm Beach home, where Ghislaine Maxwell was also present. The document details the payment structure and the victim's subsequent civil suit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the man who paid for sexualized massages from the minor victim at his Palm Beach home. He is identified as owning a modeling agency and initiating the encounter.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified by the victim as a woman in a towel who handed her lotion in Epstein's bathroom prior to the encounter. The victim recognized her later from news reports.

persons.name: [REDACTED]
persons.context: The primary interviewee. She was a 15-year-old high school student in approximately 2004 when she was recruited by a friend to give Epstein a massage for money.

persons.name: [REDACTED]
persons.context: A friend of the victim who told her about Epstein, arranged the meeting, transported her to the house, and was paid $150 for bringing her.

connections.description: The victim was recruited to give Epstein a sexualized massage for money when she was 15 years old.
Maxwell was present in Epstein's home during the victim's visit, facilitating the encounter by providing lotion.
[REDACTED] recruited her friend [REDACTED] to go to Epstein's house, explained the payment structure, and transported her there.
[REDACTED] was paid $150 by Epstein for bringing the victim [REDACTED] to his home.

events.title: Sexual Abuse of Minor at Epstein Home
events.description: A 15-year-old girl ([REDACTED]) was recruited and taken to Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach home, where she was paid to give him a sexualized massage while he masturbated. Ghislaine Maxwell was present.

events.title: FBI Victim Interview
events.description: The victim ([REDACTED]) was interviewed by the FBI, a victim specialist, and a detective at 505 S Flagler Drive, West Palm Beach, Florida.

events.title: Victim Files Civil Suit
events.description: At age 17, the victim filed a civil suit related to the incident, which is how she confirmed she was 15 at the time of the abuse.

locations: 505 S Flagler Drive, West Palm Beach, Florida (Interview location)
Palm Beach Island, Florida (Location of Jeffrey Epstein's home)
keyFacts: A victim ([REDACTED]) was 15 years old in approximately 2004 when she was recruited by a friend to give Jeffrey Epstein a sexualized massage for money.
Ghislaine Maxwell was present in Epstein's home during the encounter, handing lotion to the victim before Epstein entered.
The payment structure was explained in advance: $200 for the victim, with a $150 finder's fee for the recruiter.
The victim was instructed to lie about her age, telling Epstein she was 16 instead of 15.
This FBI interview was conducted in 2019, and the victim had previously filed a civil suit as a minor (at age 17).
